instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP THEME: Ensure the dark mode toggle works correctly using the 'class' strategy in Tailwind.
3. BUILD LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that includes the Sidebar and Header. All dashboard pages must use this.
4. DATA GRID: When building the Line Losses table, prioritize DENSITY. Do not use comfortable spacing. It must feel like a high-performance tool.
5. CALCULATIONS: Ensure all frontend calculations happen in real-time as the user types in the modal/grid.
6. CHARTS: Use Recharts (via Shadcn Charts if available, or raw Recharts) for the Loss Trend and Monthly Summary.
7. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure high contrast for all data values. Use the defined colors.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all inputs, buttons, and key table cells.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
